mainText:
In 1984 I was in kindergarten and took my very first DOS Apple computer 
class.  It was a big deal and I was so excited about everything I 
learned!  Years later at the age of 34 I am still an Apple girl and 
always will be.  I was so sad to learn of Steve Jobs's passing and will 
be praying for strength and peace for his family during this difficult 
time.
author: Amber
